# SAN FRANCISCO HEADSHOTS & PORTRAITS

## COMPANY HEADSHOT DAYS

**COMPANY HEADSHOT DAYS**

Headshot Days are a great option for corporate and non-profit clients who want
to create professional looking headshots for their employees. We come to your
San Francisco Bay Area location and spend the day capturing your employees at
your convenience.

Headshot Days include:

  * One photographer

  * All camera, lighting and background equipment

  * White, grey, black or custom backdrop 

  * Up to 8 hours of shoot time

  * Images delivered as JPG files within 3 business days

  * License to use images on LinkedIn, social media, and business websites

## HEADSHOT STATIONS for: •CONFERENCES  
•TRADE SHOWS  
•CORPORATE EVENTS

**HEADSHOT STATIONS FOR CONFERENCES, TRADE SHOWS + CORPORATE EVENTS**

Headshot stations are a great option for corporate and non-profit clients who
want to offer LinkedIn-style headshots to their event attendees. We come to
your conference, trade show, expo, or other company event and set up a photo
station where we spend the day capturing professional images of your guests.
Each guest receives a professional looking headshot they can use on LinkedIn,
social media or company website.  
  
Each Headshot Station includes:

  * One photographer

  * All camera, lighting and background equipment

  * Up to 8 hours

  * White, grey, black or custom color backdrop 

  * Images delivered as high resolution JPG files within 3 business days

  * License to use images on LinkedIn, social media, company and business websites

  * Basic editing (color, contrast, saturation, sharpness, cropping)  

## INDIVIDUAL HEADSHOTS

**INDIVIDUAL HEADSHOTS**

Individual headshots are a great option for small business owners,
freelancers, and corporate / non-profit clients who need a professional
headshot for their online marketing, social media, networking, or public
relations.

Individual headshot sessions include:

  * One photographer

  * All camera, lighting and background equipment

  * White, gray, black or custom backdrop at our studio or your business location (*outdoors on request)

  * Proof images delivered as high resolution JPG files within 3 business days

  * License to use images on LinkedIn, social media, and business websites

  * Standard editing (everything included in “Basic” above, plus: skin smoothing, teeth whitening, removal of minor acne, skin shine, shadows, minor wrinkles, stray hairs)

## PERSONAL BRANDING  
&  
ENVIRONMENTAL PORTRAITS

**PERSONAL BRANDING SESSIONS**

We offer editorial, personal branding and environmental portraits to small
business owners and entrepreneurs for social media and public relations use.
We come to your home, workplace or other location to capture your personality
in a compelling and artistic manner.

Individual headshot sessions include:

  * Wardrobe consultation

  * Hair and Make Up Artist

  * One photographer

  * All camera and lighting equipment

  * Photographed at your home, business or a location of your choice

  * Proof images delivered as JPG files within 5 business days

  * License to use images on LinkedIn, social media, company and business websites

  * Intermediate editing (everything included in “Basic” above, plus: skin smoothing, teeth whitening, removal of minor acne, skin shine, shadows, minor wrinkles, stray hairs)

## HEADSHOT + PORTRAIT PRICING
